name: Trust the Journey
description:
#10
Sometimes the situation you are in seems difficult and unbearable.
Sometimes you have no idea why you are suffering so much.
It's all part of a long journey. 
All your life is a journey.
And there is magic in it.
Nothing is random. 
Trust the Journey.

Piece #10 of the collection:
I'm not your therapist but I'd like to cheer you up with my dorky art

The series focuses on the fragility of the inner world and brings up topics that we often find in our long journey on earth.
